definition.name: Slash Command Dispatch
definition.description: Facilitates "ChatOps" by creating dispatch events for slash commands
definition.author: peter-evans

inputs.name: token
inputs.description: A repo scoped GitHub Personal Access Token.

inputs.name: reaction-token
inputs.description: An optional GitHub token to use for reactions.

inputs.name: reactions
inputs.description: Add reactions to comments containing commands.

inputs.name: commands
inputs.description: A comma or newline separated list of commands.

inputs.name: permission
inputs.description: The repository permission level required by the user to dispatch commands.

inputs.name: issue-type
inputs.description: The issue type required for commands.

inputs.name: allow-edits
inputs.description: Allow edited comments to trigger command dispatches.

inputs.name: repository
inputs.description: The full name of the repository to send the dispatch events.

inputs.name: event-type-suffix
inputs.description: The repository dispatch event type suffix for the commands.

inputs.name: static-args
inputs.description: A comma or newline separated list of arguments that will be dispatched with every command.

inputs.name: config-from-file
inputs.description: JSON configuration from a file for commands.
